entry.content:
[–]

Story of two twin brothers named Yuvraj & Raju. Raju wants to take revenge of his parents murder and therefore he starts killing his parents murderers one by one. Yuvraj being a cop tries to arrest Raju but fails at it. Watch the movie to see whether Raju is succesful in taking the revenge and whether yuvraj is able to arrest his own brother.

entry.title: Yeh Gulistan Hamara
entry.content:
[–]

Vijay (Dev Anand), a young and dynamic civil engineer, is assigned with the tasks of bridging the gap between Indian and Chinese villages by constructing a bridge between the two villages. This bridge was going to help them socially as well as economically, but the villagers on both sides of the border didn’t want the bridge to be constructed. Vijay managed to convince the villagers on the Indian side to help in constructing the bridge. But the Chinese villager’s objected to the bridge under the command of their crooked ruler, Deng Do Rani (Pran), who didn’t want to have good relations with India. The construction of the bridge started with the help of villagers on the Indian side but to destroy progress, Deng Do Rani sends his goons to disrupt their work and threaten Vijay. But on the contrary Vijay falls in love with one of his goons, Soo Reni (Sharmila Tagore). Soo Reni also falls in love with Vijay and is moved by the benefits of the bridge after Vijay explains it to her. Deng Do Rani grows furious after he learns about Soo Reni’s betrayal and issues orders to kill her. Will Soo Reni survive the odds stacked against her? Can Vijay triumph in his mission to build a bridge and unite the two borders?

Subscribe and Stay Tuned – http://goo.gl/eXlZ3

entry.title: Yeh Diljale - Full Bollywood Movie - Sai Kumar, Thriller Manju
entry.content:
[–]

Watch Yeh Diljale – Bollywood Movie. Producer : Imran Qureshi, Director :Thriller Manju, Cast :Sai Kumar, Manju. Synopsis: ACP Narhari goes ahead with various missions to reach the secret of every underworld plan and accordingly imprisons the hooligans. Narsimha is also a capable young guy who enters Narhari’s house on a secret mission. He is basically on a mission to kill Narhari. Fortunately, Narhari keeps safe and now needs to know the reason behind Narsimha’s behavior. His father reveals a secret to Narhari but he could not define the problem clearly. To understand the depth of this difficulty Narhari reaches Hyderabad. Here he meets Lavanya and falls in love with her. Will Narhari get exposed to the problem and will he be able to solve it successfully?

entry.title: Vivah
entry.content:
[–]

Watch Bollywood Romantic superhit family drama movie, Rajshri Productions’ Vivah – A journey from engagement to marriage with English subtitles, starring Shahid Kapur & Amrita Rao, directed by Sooraj R. Barjatya, music composed by Ravindra Jain.

Vivah is the story of Poonam & Prem. Poonam (Amrita Rao) an orphaned middle-class girl lives with her uncle (Alok Nath) and aunt (Seema Biswas). Poonam’s chachi (aunt) has been unable to accept Poonam as part of their family as she is more beautiful than her own daughter, Rajni (Amrita Prakash). Poonam’s simple and affectionate demeanor touches the heart of Bhagatji (Manoj Joshi), who takes her marriage proposal for Prem (Shahid Kapoor), son of renowned businessman Mr. Harishchandra (Anupam Kher). Inspite of being brought up in the fast city life of New Delhi, Prem is rooted to the ground and has retained his family’s traditional values and upbringing.

Respecting his fathers wishes, Prem agrees to meet Poonam to get to know her better, which, follows a ‘meeting’ arranged by the two families. Prem and Poonam suddenly find themselves in midst of a situation they have never been in before. They discover their soul mates in each other and are engaged – to be married in six months. Prem and Poonam go through the most magical and romantic period of their lives. Six months fly by and just when everything is set for Prem and Poonam’s marriage… a crisis puts the love of Prem and Poonam through a trial by fire. ‘Vivah’ is a heart-warming tale of their unconditional love…

entry.title: Tyaagi - Rajnikanth, Mithun Chakraborty
entry.content:
[–]

Jagdish (Mithun Chakraborty) lives a simple and honest life with his wife Savitri. Jagdish’s co-workers and cruel parents prey on his innocence and take advantage of him. Jagdish is tormented by corruption and atrocities around him and he transforms himself into a man of absolute power. He starts moonlighting as a vigilante named Alfred to fight crime and serve justice. A man named Ranjit sets his eyes on Savitri and schemes devious plans to break her marriage. What price will Jagdish pay to vanquish evil as Alfred? Can he save his wife before it’s too late?

entry.title: Tezaab
entry.content:
[–]

Mahesh Deshmukh (Anil Kapoor) has joined the nation’s armed forces as that he can honestly and patriotically serve the country. During his college days he has a run-in with fellow-collegian Mohini (Madhuri Dixit). A bet between his friends and himself ends up with him falling in love with Mohini, who subsequently realizes that he indeed has fallen in love with her, and she too reciprocates. Mohini’s dad (Anupam Kher) is an alcoholic and wishes that Mohini takes up dancing and prostitution so that he can get his daily dose of alchol. Mohini attempts to take refuge with Mahesh, however, cirumstances tangle Mahesh to such an extent that he is arrested, charged, and sentenced to stay away from Bombay city limits. When Mahesh returns, it is no longer the honest, and patriotic Mahesh, but a gangster named Munna, who has many old scores to settle.

entry.title: Taqatwala - Chiranjeevi - Bollywood Action Full Length Movie
entry.content:
[–]

Watch the classic Bollywood film Taqatwala (1983) Starring: Chiranjeevi, Madhavi, Silk Smita, Prem Kumar, Chitra Sushma. Directed by K S R Doss.

Synopsis: Taqatwala is an action suspense thriller based movie in which, Chiranjeevi played the role of CID informer and Thyagaraju and Prabhakar are two gang leaders and CID officer Neelima (Silk Smitha) is assigned to burst their underworld.

Neelima uses Sikander (Chiranjeevi), who works for them, as her informer, but before sikander manages to gather enough evidences, Prabhakar comes to know about his reality and kills him. Now, Neelima is left without any support in her mission. Oneday, she spots a Sikander look a like (chiru again) and persuades him to act like sikander, During this process, they fall in love with each other. In the end, sikander manages to liquidate all secret activities of thyagu and bhayankar and helps neelima in completing her mission.

entry.title: Swarg Yahan Narak Yahan
entry.content:
[–]

Vijay (Mithun Chakraborty) is an honest police officer married to Suman (Sumalatha). Several years after their marriage, Suman gives birth to Suraj, and Suman spoils Suraj as he is their only son. As a result Suraj grows up to be a brat, falls into bad company and Vijay is forced to send Suraj to a distant Boarding school. Suraj grows up in the boarding school with hatred for his father and years later he return home. Suraj meets Haveli Ram (Gulshan Grover), father of his childhood rich friend Bharat. Haveli Ram ropes in Suraj for his drug smuggling ring and uses his fathers house as a secret hideout for the illegal activity. Time comes when this treachery gets exposed and Vijay must decide the fate of his only son. But with Suraj continuing on the path of destruction, what will Vijay do?

entry.title: Shraap Deta Hun, Tu Kutti Ban Ja - Johnny Lever, Himani Shivpuri - Comedy Scene - Yaar Gaddar
entry.content:
[–]

Watch the comedy scene “Shraap Deta Hun, Tu Kutti Ban Ja” from the bollywood romantic movie Yaar Gaddar (1994) Starring Saif Ali Khan, Mithun Chakraborty, Somi Ali & Prem Chopra. Directed by Parvesh Mehra. Produced by Umesh Mehra. Music by Anu Malik.

This scene shows Police Constable (Johnny Lever) meeting a group of priests and requesting them to do black magic to rid of his inspector wife Pushpa (Himani Shivpuri) who is a nagger. Pushpa who is in search of some con men mistakenly identifies these priests as those conmen and starts bad mouthing them. One of the priests gets angry and curses Pushpa of becoming a dog because she accused a holy person of being conman. Minutes later Pushpa starts behaving like a dog. Is it for real, watch the hilarious scene to know more:

entry.title: Sharmilee
entry.content:
[–]

Captain Ajit (Shashi Kapoor) crosses paths with young and energetic Kamini (Rakhee) in Kashmir and instantly falls in love with her. After a brief romance, Kamini disappears leaving Ajit in despair of ever seeing her again. Meanwhile, Ajit’s guardian, Father Joseph (Nazir Hussein) seeks to arrange Ajit’s marriage to Kamini’s twin sister, Kanchan (Rakhee in double role), not knowing Ajit has fallen for Kamini. Ajit agrees to the marriage mistaking Kanchan to be Kamini but when the truth comes out, Ajit insists on marrying Kamini, leaving Kanchan heart-broken. Things take a violent turn when Kundan (Ranjeet) a villain from Kamini’s past surfaces and threatens to destroy her. Kundan attacks Kamini but ends up getting murdered. In a race to dispose Kundan’s body, Kamini meets with an accident and her car falls off a cliff. Presumed dead, Kamini’s parents make Kanchan to pose as Kamini and marry her off to Ajit. Is Kamini dead? What happens when the truth gets exposed? Subscribe and Stay Tuned – http://goo.gl/eXlZ3

entry.title: Shandaar
entry.content:
[–]

Shanker (Mithun Chakraborty) belongs to a poor family, and is living with his brother Ashok (Sumeet Saigal) and his mother in a village. Shanker works as a woodcutter to fulfill the needs of his family and wants his brother to study and become a big man, so he sends him to a college in Mumbai to complete his studies. Shanker meets Rani (Meenakshi Sheshadri), who comes from a missle class family background and they both fall in love. Shanker finds an admirer in Anita Chaurasia (Mandakini), who is a daughter of a multimillionaire industrialist and politician Rai Bahadur Arjun Chaurasia (Kader Khan). Shanker finds out about Arjun’s illegal work done and decides to expose him. While Arjun gets to know about Shanker’s plan about exposing him, he hires a gangster named Dhaga (Danny Denzongpa) to get him killed. Will Shanker be able to expose Arjun to the people in the village? Will Dhaga be able to succeed in killing Shanker?

entry.title: Sawaan Ko Aane Do
entry.content:
[–]

Sawaan Ko Aane Do – 1979 Directed By : Kanak Mishra Starring : Zarina Wahab, Arun Govil, Reeta Bhaduri, Amrish Puri, Pinchoo Kapoor, Ram Mohan, Jagirdar, Roopesh Kumar, Yunus Parvez, Jagirdar, Jankidas, Surendar Kumar, Leela Mishra. Music Director : Rajkamal. Synopsis : Birju (Arun Govil) lives in a small village and likes to sing. The village zamindar’s (Amrish Puri) city-educated daughter, Chandrika (Zarina Wahab) returns to the village and is thrilled by Birju’s voice. She encourages him to share his talents with the world and thus earn a living. Eventually both fall in love. Her father is angered when he comes to know of their affair, and he sends her back to the city and warns Birju of attempting to even think about her. Heartbroken Birju decides to go to the city, and there he meets with Gitanjali (Rita Bhaduri), who is also thrilled by his voice. She assists him in getting an audition, and which turns out to be a success. Soon Birju is singing over the radio, and becomes wealthy and popular. In the meantime, Chandrika’s pround dad has lost an important court case, and as a result lost all his wealth, but his pride is still intact. When Birju returns to ask for the hand of Chandrika, he is again rebuked. Will Birju and Chandrika ever marry? Or will Birju marry Gitanjali?

Subscribe and Stay Tuned – http://goo.gl/eXlZ3
